author: Kitty Johnson
method: Mash half of the raspberries with the sugar, torn mint leaves, and squeeze of half a lemon. Pour into the bottom of a jug. Pour in the cranberry juice, red wine, and some ice. Top with lemonade, raspberries, a few slices of lemon, and mint leaves.
